author: Rebecca Lawrence For Mailonline
title: Kim Kardashian flaunts her peachy derriere in abikini | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Flattering her tanned complexion, the scanty garment offered a look at her impeccably toned abs and jaw dropping posterior. Wearing her raven coloured locks loose and poker straight, the mother-of-two also donned a pair of reflective gold shades. In another sizzling snap, Kim was seen reclining on the pool edge, whilst her famous figure was exhibited in a black two-piece. Costa chica! Flaunting her famous derriere, the reality starlet, 36, sizzled in a series of skimpy bikinis that showed off her phenomenal figure A saucy snapshot taken from behind showed that the garment was thong style, ensuring her best asset would be on full display. Kim wasn't alone in all her snaps, sharing a series of sweet pictures with husband Kanye West. Clad in a plunging white jumpsuit, the brunette bombshell showed off her ample bust, whilst a gold choker drew further attention to her decotellage. Cheeky! A saucy snapshot taken from behind showed that her swimsuit was thong style, ensuring her best asset would be on full display Brunette bombshell: Wearing her raven coloured locks loose and poker straight, the mother-of-two also donned a pair of reflective gold shades Kim recently heaped praise on her newly-blonde beau after he held another runway show for his Yeezy collection at New York Fashion Week. She tweeted: 'So proud of my baby for his amazing show today! It was so good! I'm so SO proud of him!!! #yeezyseason5.' The show was attended by multiple celebrities, including Kylie Jenner, boyfriend Tyga, LaLa Anthony and Anna Wintour. Two's company: Kim wasn't alone in all her snaps, sharing a series of sweet pictures with husband Kanye West, seemingly just enjoying some downtime together Busting out: Clad in a plunging white jumpsuit, the brunette bombshell showed off her ample bust, whilst a gold choker drew further attention to her decotellage Keep up with Kim in a simple white top by ATM Â£108.26
